We envision a world where dessert indulges are made less guilty, time is forgotten and life is simply enjoyed. Transformation takes place one healthy dessert choice at a time where the human body, mind, heart, and soul are rejuvenated.

settings.sciencehtml:
METEABOLISM: WHAT IS IT?

Metabolism is a multi-step chemical process by which the body converts food into usable energy.

Factors like genetics, age, sex, body composition, height, weight, diet, activity and hormonal balance determine your basal metabolism, which is the energy expendature needed to sustain life.

3 SIGNS YOUR METABOLISM IS SLOWING
  • Bloating and puffiness
  • Unexplained and stubborn weight gain, especially in the midsection
  • Fatique, low energy, brain fog and anxiety.
settings.ingredientsmain: Powerful, key ingredients to keep you healthy inside and out
settings.ingredients1:
A powerful protein that promotes radiant skin, improves skin texture and firmness, and reduces wrinkles.* It strengthens hair and nail growth, and improves digestive, immune, metabolism, muscle, and bone health.*

*We use collagen that’s clinically proven for efficacy in benefits and high bioavailability
settings.ingredients2: An essential vitamin that helps convert food into energy production and boosts metabolism. Additionally, biotin strengthens hair and nail growth.*
settings.ingredients3: An herb packed with silica and antioxidant properties. Horsetail strengthens hair and nails, soothes and tightens skin, and boosts immune and bone health.* It’s been known to help with skin issues such as acne, eczema, and rosacea.*
settings.ingredients4: A delectable treat with antioxidant and anti-aging properties.* Cacao helps repair skin cell damage, reduce everyday stress, and boost mood.* Additionally, it is known to promote better sleep and increase sexual drive.*
settings.howto1: 1.  POUR ONE SCOOP INTO A CUP, BLENDER, OR BOTTLE.
settings.howto2: 2. ADD IN WARM MILK OF CHOICE.
settings.howto3: 3. MIX, BLEND, OR SHAKE THOROUGHLY UNTIL DISSOLVED.
settings.howtoextra:
TIP

Powder dissolves best in hot liquids and when using a blender. For chilled beverages, pour thoroughly mixed preparation over ice.
settings.q1: WHAT DOES CACAO BEAUTY SUPERFOOD POWDER TASTE LIKE?
settings.a1: CACAO Beauty Superfood Powder tastes like a guilt-free chocolate indulgence.
settings.q2: WHEN SHOULD I USE CACAO BEAUTY SUPERFOOD POWDER?
settings.a2: CACAO Beauty Superfood Powder can be used throughout the day, in a variety of ways including concocting cacao lattes or adding to smoothies, oatmeal, chia pudding, baking, and more.
settings.q3: HOW OFTEN SHOULD I TAKE CACAO BEAUTY SUPERFOOD POWDER?
settings.a3: For best results, CACAO Beauty Superfood Powder should be taken once to twice per day, on a daily basis.
settings.q4: HOW LONG WILL IT TAKE FOR ME TO START SEEING RESULTS?
settings.a4:
While some people see results within 3-4 weeks, others may take 2-4 months. It’s what’s happening on the inside that counts. Our ingredients collaboratively improve your overall health and wellbeing - happier mood, sustained energy, mental clarity, better digestion, and lessened cravings, to name a few. Generally speaking, it takes 2-4 months for our bodies to reach a new equilibrium - external factors such as skin and hair may take up to this amount of time to see a distinct difference. That said, we suggest keeping track of your progress by taking a photo before using our products and a photo after each month of use. This will help you see your progress, side by side.

Please note, results may vary from person to person. We believe this is about self-progress - not perfection - to become your best self.

settings.bsub: Pure, Clean, & Clinically Supported By Science
See What Your Body Is Capable Of

settings.contenttitle: Everything You Need To Feel Whole, In One Dose
settings.content1toptitle: Beauty + Health Supported By Science, Driven By Results
settings.content1toptext:
Wholy Dose is a unique formula of clinically-proven, collagen-based supplements–Giving you everything you need to sip your way towards noticeably better beauty, health, and wellness.

Clean, pure, and no compromise: We took the time to source quality ingredients that work holistically together to maximize results, all backed by science–Providing you with what you want and deserve, without having to compromise taste or the means of getting there.
settings.content1title: A New Standard Of Beauty, On Your Terms
settings.content1:
We needed a new standard for beauty, so we created one. At Wholy Dose, we're redefining beauty: what beauty means, looks like, and should feel like.

Traditional beauty products weren't doing us any good. They all tried to cover up who we are, instead of improving what was on the inside. Which, led us to discovering the power of ingestible beauty.

More than a beauty product, a mission we stand by–Because you’re the only person who can define your beauty. Beauty not founded in comparison, but self-acceptance, self-progress, and self-love.

Our products help you achieve self-acceptance, through supplementing the natural beautifying and healthy properties already in you, and self-progress, through the continuous journey of improving yourself, inside and out, ultimately achieving self-love, so you can feel comfortable and confident in your own skin and body–at all times.
settings.content2:
I spent most of my life trying to change how I looked—I yearned for perfect skin, thicker hair and longer lashes. This notion of wanting to look different simply because I wasn’t satisfied with my genetics led me to wear makeup whenever I left the house, even to get the mail.

After 10 years of trying countless products, hoping one would deliver the results it promised, nothing I tried–topicals, vitamins, and even changing my diet–gave me the results I craved.

Not giving up, I began to experiment with different supplement blends and tested them on myself until I discovered a formula that finally gave me those results. That formula is what Wholy Dose is today, what we call our Wholy Grail. My skin improved, hair thickened, and digestion and immune strengthened–overturning a lifetime of daily stomach aches and semi-annual colds.

For the first time in my life, I was happy in my own skin and stopped comparing myself with others. Instead, I started to focus on continuing to improve myself–in a natural, holistic way.
settings.content3:
I then realized beauty isn’t about looking the best, it’s about looking and feeling your best. You already have what it takes to feel beautiful and whole, from the inside and outside–We’re just here to bring that out through supplementation.

With Love,
Gina Nguyen Holzer

settings.storycontent:
VITAE LONDON was born out of our desire to produce stunning watches like those of old, but at prices that don’t break the bank.

Based in London, England we combine beautiful, minimalist watch design with maximal social justice.

Subtle, slim and at once sophisticated, each Vitae London timepiece is imbued with the premise behind our mission: “Time, and its opportunities, belongs to all of us, wherever we are in the world, we can live without limits.”

"Ensuring our watches are of the highest quality standards is a priority for us; each watch features either a high quality genuine leather band or a stainless steel band, and is equipped with elegant scratch-resistant sapphire crystal glass.”
settings.storytitle2: It takes a village to watch the next generation...
settings.storycontent2:
Time on this planet is something we all share, but the life chances that occupy it are far from evenly distributed—even in this day and age.

Many children in Sub-Saharan Africa lack access to bare necessities which we in other areas around the globe may often take for granted.

In 2010, Claudia Adoasi, the wife to Vitae London’s founder, travelled to the stunning city of Port Elizabeth, South Africa to volunteer with the not-for-profit, House of Wells. Created by two British missionaries in 2008, House of Wells exists to restore hope and dignity to African children by empowering them to realise their potential. The experience had a profound impact on us. It inspired us to make a contribution too.

Along with charities on the ground, Vitae London are embracing the innovative spirit of some of the world’s most difficult to reach youth so that we can make a difference.
settings.storycontent3:
And now the global village of Vitae London customers, in time zones from Accra to Atlanta to Tokyo and beyond, are making a huge difference to the life chances of children throughout Africa.

Each timepiece purchased from our classic range of watches sees a child through the year with... Two sets of a school uniform—children who would otherwise be turned away from school in their own clothes, can now be admitted. (In partnership with House of Wells) OR

A Solar Light—this is particularly important for the children in the rural areas with no electricity, by providing these lights they no longer have to walk for hours for a street lamp or burn harmful fuels like kerosene to study in the evenings. (In partnership with Pen To Paper Ghana) Through you, we’re making education for children in Africa more possible. Thank you for being part of our global village, the Vitae family,

William Adoasi, Founder and CEO

settings.blocktitle: What materials are used in making a Vitae London watch?
settings.blocktext:
• The watch core and casing is made from stainless steel
  • The straps are made from genuine leather
  • We use quality Japanese Quartz Movement
  • Our Vitae London face is a Scratch Resistant Sapphire Crystal Glass

settings.blocktitle: Are Vitae London watches water resistant?
settings.blocktext: The materials we use allows a water resistance of up to 5ATM

ATM or “atmospheres” is the amount of pressure a watch can withstand before leaking. A 5ATM watch will withstand pressures equivalent to depth of 50 meters, or 165ft under water. It is important to note that this is a measure of pressure NOT depth.

5ATM is suitable for rain, splashing and showering but not diving, snorkelling or water sports.

settings.faqq: WHERE ARE WHOLY DOSE PRODUCTS MADE?
settings.faqa: All Wholy Dose products are manufactured in the USA, in an FDA approved, cGMP (Current Good Manufacturing Practice) certified, state of the art facility, that's regulated by the FDA to assure proper control of manufacturing material, processes, and facilities. Our products contain clinically-proven ingredients that go through testing for safety and to ensure high purity. All of our products are gluten-free, dairy-free, soy-free, sugar-free, and are keto and paleo friendly.

settings.faqq: WHAT IS THE SOURCE OF YOUR COLLAGEN?
settings.faqa:
Our marine collagen is sourced from non-GMO tilapia and pangasius fish from Europe and is Kosher certified. Our bovine collagen is sourced from non-GMO, grass-fed, pasture-raised, antibiotic-free cattle from South America.

Both types of collagen are sustainably sourced and don't contain any fillers or preservatives.

settings.faqq: IS YOUR COLLAGEN CLINICALLY PROVEN?
settings.faqa:
Yes! The collagen we use is clinically proven to improve skin elasticity and smoothness, increase firmness and hydration, reduce wrinkles, improve hair health, and strengthen joints, bones, and muscles in as little as 4-8 weeks. Additionally, it supports nail, digestive, and immune health.

Studies have also been conducted using our collagen to show it is highly effective and highly bioavailable (easily absorbed by the body).

settings.faqq: IS YOUR COLLAGEN HIGHLY BIOAVAILABLE?
settings.faqa: Yes. Our collagen is highly bioavailable and goes through hydrolysis - a carefully controlled process that breaks down collagen molecules into smaller units so it can be easily digested and absorbed by the body. In fact, studies have been conducted on the collagen we use, showing that it is, indeed, easily absorbed and digested by the body.

settings.faqq: TELL ME MORE ABOUT YOUR HYDROLYSIS PROCESS
settings.faqa:
An international team of scientists uses the most advanced technology for our collagen's hydrolysis process of sterilization, pasteurization, ultrafiltration, and crystallization to ensure validated, safe, and effective methods.

These experts are constantly seeking new and improved ways to develop and offer the highest quality of collagen so, we can provide it for you.

settings.faqq: WHY ARE YOUR PRODUCTS IN POWDER FORM INSTEAD OF PILLS?
settings.faqa: Simply put, we don’t like the feeling or aftertaste of swallowing pills - we also understand that a pill regimen can be easily forgotten or deliberately avoided. Additionally, capsules can take longer for the body to break down compared to powder.

settings.faqq: WHY ARE THERE OTHER KEY INGREDIENTS IN ADDITION TO COLLAGEN?
settings.faqa: We started with collagen and went further. The science is clear about the role of collagen and its benefits, but we didn’t stop there. We took a look at how and what other ingredients can additionally help boost skin, hair, nail, and overall health so, you can reap all the beauty and health benefits in one serving - or we like to say, in one dose.

settings.faqq: HOW OFTEN SHOULD I USE WHOLY DOSE PRODUCTS?
settings.faqa: For best results, we recommend using our products once to twice per day, on a daily basis.

settings.faqq: HOW MUCH COLLAGEN SHOULD I TAKE? IS THERE AN IDEAL DOSAGE?
settings.faqa: We recommend taking 8-20g per day, on a daily basis for best results.

settings.faqq: WHEN WILL I START SEEING RESULTS?
settings.faqa:
While some people see results within 3-4 weeks, others may take 2-4 months, and that’s okay. It’s what’s happening on the inside that counts. Our ingredients collaboratively improve your overall health and wellbeing - happier mood, sustained energy, mental clarity, better digestion, and lessened cravings, to name a few. Generally speaking, it takes 2-4 months for our bodies to reach a new equilibrium - external factors such as skin and hair may take up to this amount of time to see a distinct difference.

That said, we suggest keeping track of your progress by taking a photo before using our products and a photo after each month of use. This will help you see your progress, side by side.

Please note, results may vary from person to person. This is about self-progress - not perfection - to become your best self.

settings.faqq: CAN I MIX WHOLY DOSE PRODUCTS TOGETHER?
settings.faqa:
Yes! Our products can be mixed together based on your taste and dosage preferences.

A product combination example is mixing our UNFLAVORED Beauty Superfood Powder with any other blend for an additional skin, hair, nail, and health boost.

settings.faqq: CAN I TAKE YOUR PRODUCTS IF I’M PREGNANT OR NURSING?
settings.faqa: Our products contain the medicinal herb horsetail (equisetum arvense), but because there haven’t been enough studies that show its safety during pregnancy, at this stage, we’re not able to recommend its use during these times. We always recommend you seek advice from your health care practitioner before using if you’re pregnant or nursing.

settings.faqq: IS YOUR COLLAGEN VEGAN?
settings.faqa:
No, there is no direct source of vegan collagen, as collagen is inherently an animal product. While there are vegan collagen products sold, they don’t contain collagen, but rather, are sourced from plants that may improve skin and hair.

We do NOT test on animals and never will.

settings.faqq: I HAVE BEEN EXPERIENCING DIGESTIVE DISCOMFORT, WHAT DOES THIS MEAN?
settings.faqa: Some people may encounter digestive discomfort when starting to consume collagen or switching collagen brands. This is likely due to your body not being used to the way the amino acids in collagen are broken down by your stomach. Not to worry though! Once your stomach is used to breaking down collagen, the digestive discomfort should no longer be of concern.

settings.faqq: WHAT DOES UNFLAVORED BEAUTY SUPERFOOD POWDER TASTE LIKE?
settings.faqa: UNFLAVORED Beauty Superfood Powder is neutral in taste and great for adding to beverages and recipes.

settings.faqq: WHAT DOES MATCHA BEAUTY SUPERFOOD POWDER TASTE LIKE?
settings.faqa: MATCHA Beauty Superfood Powder tastes like green tea, but is more aromatic and fuller in flavor.

settings.faqq: WHAT DOES BEAUTY TONIC SUPERPOWDER TASTE LIKE?
settings.faqa: BEAUTY TONIC Superpowder has a slight pomegranate taste and is great for adding to water and other beverages.

settings.faqq: HOW MUCH DOES SHIPPING COST?
settings.faqa:
Standard shipping for orders: $4.95 - $6.95, unless otherwise noted.
Expedited shipping options are available for an additional fee and will be listed at checkout.

settings.faqq: HOW LONG WILL IT TAKE FOR MY ORDER TO ARRIVE?
settings.faqa:
Orders ship within 1-3 business days from the date of purchase, unless otherwise noted. Please allow 3-7 business days after that for your package to arrive. In certain cases, orders may arrive within 2-5 business days. If you wish to recieve your package quicker, please select priority shipping or expedited shipping at checkout to ensure it arrives in time.

*HOLIDAY SEASON: Please allow extra time for your package to arrive due to carrier/fullfilment holiday shipping schedules. To ensure your package will arrive in time for the holidays, you can select priority shipping or expedited shipping at checkout.

settings.faqq: HOW DO I CHECK THE STATUS OF MY ORDER?
settings.faqa: When your order is in route, you will receive a shipment confirmation email with a tracking number. You can also check the status of your order by creating an account on our website or logging into your account to view your order history.

settings.faqq: DO YOU SHIP OUTSIDE OF THE UNITED STATES?
settings.faqa: We currently only ship within the United States. Let us know if you want our products elsewhere!

settings.faqq: WHAT IS YOUR RETURN POLICY?
settings.faqa:
Your satisfaction is important to us. We will gladly accept returned items within 30 days of the purchase date. We cannot accept returns for opened and used containers but will accept boxes with no more than 2 packets missing from each box (you will receive a partial refund for the remaining packets).

We do not cover shipping costs for returns. If you would like us to provide a shipping label, we can do so for a fee of $15 per return.

Once your returned items are received and inspected, we will notify you by email with the approval or rejection of your return.

*If 30 days are exceeded, we can’t accept the return.

settings.faqq: HOW DO I RETURN MY ORDER?
settings.faqa:
Please contact hello@wholydose.com for a return request. You will then receive specific return instructions.

If you are approved for a return, please make sure all items are securely placed in its original packaging.

settings.faqq: WHAT IS YOUR EXCHANGE POLICY?
settings.faqa: We do not accept exchanges at this time. If you wish to replace your items, please submit a return request and reorder the items you wish to receive.

settings.content1copy: We believe that beauty and health work the best when they're supported by science–and science agrees. Which, is why we source clean, high-quality ingredients backed by science that work collaboratively better when taken together.
settings.title: COLLAGEN
settings.icontext1: A powerful protein that restores cells to keep your body healthy, inside and out. Collagen keeps skin hydrated and plump, brightens complexion, reduces wrinkles, strengthens hair and nails, tightens cellulite, & supports immune, gut, digestive, metabolic, muscle, joint, and bone health.*
settings.icontext2: Biotin (also known as vitamin B or vitamin H) is an essential nutrient that plays a vital role in strengthening hair and nails by supporting keratin. Biotin also helps convert food into energy production and offers support in immune function.*
settings.icontext3: Horsetail, a powerful herb, has silica and antioxidant compounds to aid with the synthesis of collagen production. It enhances hair and nail health, improves skin elasticity and smoothness, and supports the immune system and bone health.*
settings.content2copy: We added superfoods to boost benefits in your overall health, mental well-being, and skin and hair. Plus, they taste delicious–naturally.
settings.icontext4:
A potent green tea, is made from the entire green tea leaf for a plethora of antioxidant and chlorophyll properties.* Matcha helps reduce inflammation, support immune health and metabolism, cleanse the body, reduce everyday stress, increase mental clarity and cognitive performance, and bring sustained energy while stimulating relaxation.*

Found In: MATCHA Beauty Superfood Powder
settings.icontext5:
Chocolate, but good for you. Cacao is a powerhouse of anti-aging and antioxidant properties.* It helps protect the skin from free radicals, restore damaged skin cells, improve skin elasticity, reduce everyday stress, boost mood, and combat fatigue.* Additionally, cacao contains nutrients like iron, zinc, and magnesium, which are known to promote relaxation, better sleep quality, and improved libido (sexual drive).*

Found In: CACAO Beauty Superfood Powder

settings.bottomtext: All our products are formulated with clean, responsible ingredients that are testedfor safety and high purity–so, you know you're getting the good stuff.

settings.tdesc1:
“As a Doctor who specialized in dermatology and now works with many mamas, I get asked how to naturally support aging skin. Collagen and silica are my top recommendation and Wholy Dose combines these powerful ingredients into delicious superfood drinks!

The formulas are clean and sweeteners won't drive up insulin. I'm thrilled to introduce these to my community as a safe and effective way to support skin and hair!
settings.tdesc2: “I'm a huge fan of Wholy Dose for myself and clients! All the ingredients are 100% REAL and have healing benefits from boosting your immune system to healing the gut and much more! I drink the Matcha every morning and throw the Cacao into smoothies and chocolate pudding. Look no further, Wholy Dose is a brand you can trust and is in integrity with your health and wellness.”
settings.tdesc3:
“Wholy Dose's Matcha Beauty Superfood Powder is a dream product! It provides sustained energy, clarity and focus.

The Matcha Beauty Superfood Powder also elevates mood, all while providing the body with essential nutrients. This product is a staple!”
